data.text: @TriSarahTops44 Society needs to realize that as a whole we have to take the focus off of weight itself and focus solely on happiness and health. Health being the key word. Something not visible to the eye.

@TriSarahTops44 I 100% agree that this is only now becoming a problem for thin people because it’s happening more by all the insta babes. Fat people have been talking about how horrible these products are for you, how they don’t work, and how aggressive advertising is for a while now..

@TriSarahTops44 @KimKardashian I truly don’t understand why everyone all of a sudden is so concerned about insta diet companies ads. This isn’t new, detox teas, appetite suppressant, “vitamins” have all been around a LONG time.
